item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.23.0.17
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.23.0.17
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 24 Jul 2025 17:08:17 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.23.0]
#108 build with updated LV-Data library to use microsconds resolution when logging to postgres
#110 Update filtering VIs:
1. fix timestamp drift issue by not replacing timestamps (as DFD library does)
2. implement forward and reverse low pass filtering to eliminate phase shift (zero phase filtering)
3. note that filter orders are now 2*n

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.22.0.15
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.22.0.15
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 22 Jul 2025 15:35:39 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.22.0]
#103 fix logging while sweeping
#104 logging paths are now configured via configuration file
#105 simulation mode chassis serial number is random number between 10101000 and 10101999
#106 updated Logging API: commands are startLogging(interval in milliseconds) and stopLogging()
#107 fix get version using framework's new Get SMO Version.vi override

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.22.0.14
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 22 Jul 2025 13:51:56 -0400

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.22.0]
#103 fix logging while sweeping
#104 logging paths are now configured via configuration file
#105 simulation mode chassis serial number is random number between 10101000 and 10101999
#106 updated Logging API: commands are startLogging(interval in milliseconds) and stopLogging()
#107 fix get version using framework's new Get SMO Version.vi override

#### Dependencies

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.15.5.40
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.15.5.40
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 22 Jul 2025 13:05:56 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.15.5]
#173 add override method "Get SMO Version.vi"
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Control Experiment v1.3.3.19
item.description:
Product: Control Experiment v1.3.3.19
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 18 Jul 2025 23:28:54 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

Release Notes: [1.3.3]
- add Get Device Path.vi (@pgwijesinghe)
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Transport v1.10.0.19
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.10.0.19
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 18 Jul 2025 18:08:04 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.10.0]
- Lockin_sweep: If called as a subVI but sweep parameters are empty use FP controls
item.dc:creator: Levylab
